verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
WORTHY IS THE LAMB
To receive power and riches,
And wisdom and might and honor,
Blessing and honor and glory
And dominion forever.
Worthy is the Lamb.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Power, riches, wisdom, and might
And blessing and honor
And dominion forevermore.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Power, riches, wisdom, and might,
And blessing and honor,
Worthy is the Lamb.
